oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of nitrogen utilization by means of the concept of primary nutrient efficiency
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seuri, Pentti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Crop husbandry
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aims of this study were: To introduce a new method, primary nutrient efficiency, for the evaluation of nutrient utilization. To demonstrate and find key factors to reach a high utilization rate of nutrients.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seuri, Pentti (2005) Evaluation of nitrogen utilization by means of the concept of primary nutrient efficiency. In: Granstedt, Artur; Thomsson, Olof and Schneider, Thomas (Eds.) Environmental impacts of eco-local food systems - final report from BERAS work package 2. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 46. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 36-42.
